input_str:
>

I prefer watching DVDs on a DVD player attached to a TV, rather than watching on my PC. DVD players are so much simpler to operate – just power it on, insert the disc and watch it. No need to wait for it to boot up, no need to start a media player and most importantly, I can shut it off instantly by flipping the mains off – no need to wait (again) while it systematically shuts itself down. Besides, watching a movie on the PC is so distracting – I’m often tempted to go online to
